thread.section_title: zFast Technologies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zFast Technologies | zfast.co.uk
thread.title: Kathy Cramer
thread.title_full: zFast Technologies reviewed by Kathy Cramer

author: Kathy Cramer
title: Kathy Cramer
text:
Only recently grabbed a single domain+host package at zFast to check out the services and must say it was the best move of the new year!
Up to 4 hosting accounts and a VPS now in the process of moving all domains that are scattered around to my new number one home!
Customer service is tops, the ticket system is regularly responded at any hour of the night and the prices are more than competitive.
If you're in the UK sack off any other provider and go with zFast, trust me you won't regret it! Lee the Business Director has just spent the past 24 hours helping me rebuild my VPS and helping me out with hints and good tips without me having to ask, if you get a choice then always ask for Lee! He's the man.
Thanks again zFast!
KC
